textHome1: This application borns due to a final degree project based on keyword extraction on schollar texts.
textHome2: Here you will be able to enjoy some features in order to generate exam questions from your texts... Obviously it is not magic ðŸ˜‰ (Althought it seems to be). It is based on a graph system that scores texts' words. You can try it now pressing down the button.
processHomeDesc: Write, upload and edit your text throught out an interactive user interface.
keywordsHomeDesc: Select, add, delete and edit the most interesting keywords.
questionsHomeDesc: Edit, export and manage the questions extracted from the text.
